content.value: This is an experimental story telling platform. You can click on                       text or objects to inspire the reader through the story.
Click here to go full screen ↓
Can you tell me a story?
That’s not a story. Tell me a real story.
That’s almost as old as you are.
How do you put a blizzard in a bottle?
How does a shrinking potion help win a race?
It would make it even harder!
I thought he didn’t like music.
Did he ever play his viola at the ballet?
What was the Race Car Driver’s name?
